not a 10,000,000 player meta.

bruh you're silver 5

just saying, the pros know what they're doing

I understand going a little off-meta like getting a Mejai's on Janna, which personally I do not do but it's not troll.

but when you look at a list of a few hundred pro games and literally nobody has Morello on Janna, it means it's not a good item on her. Even Mejai's, which again I perceive as suboptimal, has a 10% or so buildrate on her among pros, so it does have value.

Dont bring rank into this
i can go win 3 ranked games right now and jump 2 divisions, (still getting 31lp per win)
my rank is from lack of games played not lack of skill, i just came off of a 13 ranked win streak, and something like a 10 game thresh streak directly after.... I promise i will out support you.


Again youre bringing up mejais, an item i wouldnt trust on anyone thats not diamond janna or higher,
you have to remember that these guys are getting full usuage of zekes/mikhails where at lower elo they are complete noob traps.

i do agree that morellos is NOT the prime item choice for janna but it does completely have "value"

zekes is not a noob trap

there's a reason I have a 2/3rds win rate with Janna because zekes is a great item on her and morellos is shit

stick to your silver nautilus builds

There's Loop who bought a simple incomplete Chalice and won, but sure, a Morello with 20% cdr & 80AP which Chalice doesn't have is shit because "but pros didnt build it which means it sucks hurr durr durr"

1. it provides no utility
2. janna gets sufficient cdr from other items, such as talisman, zekes, ardent censer, and either locket or banner of command
3. it provides no armor or mr
4. janna will very rarely proc its grievous wounds, and it will be largely irrelevant

And playing janna is a mistake anyways,  its already been proven that you can get 90% of her peel on tankier, higher cc champs,  IE:your insanely high braum win rate.
